text: Ctrl+J on a selected pawn will toggle the visibility of that hat type
protected_text: Ctrl+J on a selected (PH_1) will toggle the visibility of that hat type
translated: 在选定的 pawn 上按 Ctrl+J 将切换该帽子类型的可见性

text: Ctrl+H on a selected pawn will toggle the visibility of that hair type under hats
protected_text: Ctrl+H on a selected (PH_1) will toggle the visibility of that hair type under hats
translated: 在选定的 pawn 上按 Ctrl+H 将切换帽子下该头发类型的可见性

text: Ctrl+K on a selected pawn will toggle the visibility of that hair and hat combination
protected_text: Ctrl+K on a selected (PH_1) will toggle the visibility of that hair and hat combination
translated: 在选定的 pawn 上按 Ctrl+K 将切换该头发和帽子组合的可见性

text: {0} can now be shown under hats
protected_text: (PH_1) can now be shown under hats
translated: {0} 现在可以显示在帽子下

text: {0} can now be hidden while indoors or undrafted
protected_text: (PH_1) can now be hidden while indoors or undrafted
translated: {0} 现在可以在室内或未起草时隐藏
